newsitem.title: USA: Sofamor says has made no announcements.
newsitem.headline: Sofamor says has made no announcements.

text.p: A spokesman for Sofamor Danek Group Inc said Tuesday the company has made no news announcements and declined further comment on a question about the increase in its stock price.
Shares in Sofamor were up 3-3/8 to 40-7/8.
Analysts said they were unaware of any unusual news supporting the stock.

Robinson-Humphrey analyst John Runningen said that buyers may be speculating that the company is an acquisition target. But he added, "I don't think management has any intention of selling the company. I think they intend to grow it."
